message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and valued at $1200000. Considering its exceptional quality and benefits, I propose a special introductory price of $1100000 for you. This is an exclusive opportunity to acquire a product that could significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of your product. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1050000.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your position and appreciate your willingness to work within your budget. In order to provide you with the best possible deal while still maintaining the value of our product, I am proposing a new price of $1075000. This offer includes a limited-time discount that reflects our commitment to finding a mutually beneficial solution.
I appreciate your efforts to accommodate my budget, Alice. I would like to counter with a price of $1060000.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I am glad to see we are making progress towards a fair agreement. To continue this positive trend, I propose a new price of $1065000. This offer includes a slight discount that reflects your commitment to our product and our desire to facilitate a transaction that benefits both parties.
I'm grateful for your continued efforts to reach a fair agreement, Alice. I would like to counter with a price of $1062500.

I'm pleased to hear that we're getting closer to an agreement, Bob. Considering your recent proposal and our mutual interest in reaching a successful outcome, I propose a final price of $1064000. This offer represents a fair compromise that respects the value of our product while acknowledging your financial constraints.
Thank you for your latest proposal, Alice. I appreciate your efforts to find a middle ground. I would like to counter with a price of $1063000.

I'm glad we've been able to discuss this further, Bob. Taking into account your most recent offer and aiming to finalize a satisfactory agreement, I propose a price of $1063500. This final offer aims to provide a fair value for our product while respecting your budget constraints.
Thank you for your final proposal, Alice. I appreciate your efforts to reach a fair agreement. I would like to counter with a price of $1062750.
